# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which holds immense value for you at $12,000. I am offering this exceptional item to you at a special price of $11,000. This is an opportunity to secure a high-quality product at a competitive rate, tailored specifically to meet your needs and expectations. I look forward to your consideration and hope we can make this transaction beneficial for both of us. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $11,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $11,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $12,000
